title: OCE and ASIA Not Being Able to Play On the NA Server Without suffering.
body: I live in Australia and i know the ping is gonna be bad (On NA) but a constant 215 ping and i have great internet 100mb up and down and like 9-15 ms also i live in NSW very close to QLD so im at the closest's distant's to the NA i can be and a constant 215 ping, it was doable before the server move but now its really hard to play on NA and your probably wondering why i dont just transfer to the OCE server and its because ALL my Friends are on the NA server and league of legends just doesnt interest me Without playing with friends, it would be great if there was a server in Hawaii so all the australian NZ And asia can play with all there NA Friends With Decent Ping but otherwise its impossible to play together without suffering, Even just like a Sub server there that can Help us play with each other that would just Amazing.

replies.body: I know right.. I wish riot would see this and consider making a sub server or something. I really miss playing with my NA friends.. :'(

well i am from melb and just started playing on OCE
i often get ping spikes up to around 300~800, i think it spiked up to 1k+ once, which last for about a minute or so
and that's VSing bots...
ISP is telstra
Are you Using Wifi Coz if so That might be your problem with them Spikes, Ethernet Is the way to go When playing games/anything {{summoner:4}}
